channel.title: STill need help with this crap
channel.description: for 2 weeks i havent been able to run my server nor compile. "System cannot find the path specified" " 'java' is not a internal or external command" i have reinstalled java 5 times tried to fix my path and classpath 10 times. lol booted up my comp 3 times what am i doing wrong???!?

item.title: STill need help with this crap
item.dc:creator: @slim2021 slim2021
item.description:
@slim2021 wrote:

I haven’t coded in a while so I’m not 100% sure this will work, but try copy and pasting this into your compiler…

@echo off title PyroScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: STill need help with this crap
